input.sentences: after coming home from work today i decided to take a short walk .
i went to the local nature trail .
i spent several minutes wandering throughout the trail | spending time enjoying nature .
i finally got to an opening which allowed me to see the houses again .
i can see my house in the distance !
output.sentences: It was a short walk home.
I decided to go on the nature trail.
Wandering down the trail, I took my time.
Finally, I saw some houses appear.
I could see my house in the distance.
